snippet: Religious superiors as well as abuse victims were invited to a symposium in Rome. Some wondered what action would come from the meeting.
abstract: Leaders of the Roman Catholic Church begin a four-day symposium about the prevention of sexual abuse of minors by the clergy, an unprecedented assembly described by the Vatican as a response to a painful issue that has wracked the church and estranged many of its faithful; religious superiors as well as abuse victims are invited.
lead_paragraph: Religious superiors as well as abuse victims were invited to a symposium in Rome. Some wondered what action would come from the meeting.

headline.seo: Roman Catholics Convene to Discuss Sexual Abuse Prevention
headline.main: Catholic Leaders Convene to Discuss Abuse Prevention
headline.print_headline: Catholic Leaders Meet to Discuss Abuse Prevention
